text: Deux Rivières is a commune in the department of Yonne, central France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of Cravant (the seat) and Accolay.Arrêté préfectoral 26 April 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Yonne department == References == Category:Communes of Yonne
title: Deux Rivières
